plot: Kyiv in the nineties, tainted by a serious economic collapse and rising crime. A group of kids boost the family budget by washing cars at a gas station whose proprietors make a living in a rather dodgy way.The story is narrated by the 13-year-old protagonist who eventually discovers how much this society has affected him
title: Mijniki avtomobiliv
